name: Battle Survivor
description:
This game is a fps game in which players must protect objectives from enemies.

Players must use the right weapon's element on the right enemies to kill them. 

The more enemies you kill, the more points you get.

Controls

-- Azerty users --

- Z, S, Q, D - Move character
- Left Click - Fire
- Right Click - Fire secondary hand
- E - Swap element weapon
- Shift - Run
- 1, 2, 3, 4 - Select weapon
- Escape Unlock the mouse
- L Lock the mouse

-- Qwerty users --

- W, S, A, D - Move character
- Left Click - Fire
- Right Click - Fire secondary hand
- E - Swap element weapon
- Shift - Run
- 1, 2, 3, 4 - Select weapon
- Escape Unlock the mouse
- L Lock the mouse

Game Information

The game is really hard and play a lot with your adaptation skills. 
We don't think anyone will be able to finish the first 10 waves at least, but if you do let us know in the comment!

Team Information

We are two passionate creator that really love to make games!
